name: Step 6
description: Update the swarm with a more detailed report, including the root cause of the failure and the last job the agent was working on.
path_to_scripting: This step can be implemented as a script that is executed after the post-mortem analysis is complete. The script would gather the findings of the analysis (including the root cause of the failure and the identified last job) and generate a comprehensive report. This report would then be communicated to the swarm using the agent's inter-agent communication mechanism (e.g., by creating a new JSON file in the `<YYYY>/<Q#>/<MM>/<DD>/md/comms/` directory), ensuring all relevant agents are informed about the incident.
